text: @realDonaldTrump So this doesn't apply to destroyed Confederate monuments,  right? They don't memorialize US veterans, just treasonous, slavery defending losers. Also, awesome job prioritizing the protection of statues over people dying of coronavirus, or Americans of color, or the poor...
